cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning to learn similarity measures, which is a common topic in the sub-fields of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of similarity measures in case-based reasoning (cs.IR) and clustering data (cs.CV), which are both relevant sub-fields. Additionally, the paper discusses the evaluation of the similarity measures on datasets, which is a common practice in natural language processing (cs.CL).
